briefTitle: Dermatitis During Adjuvant Irradiation for BREAst Cancer:
officialTitle: Dermatitis During Adjuvant Irradiation for BREAst Cancer: Grade ≥2 Radiation Dermatitis in Breast Cancer Patients with or Without a Mobile Application (Reminder-App)
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

1. Histologically proven invasive breast cancer
2. Indication for adjuvant hypo-fractionated radiotherapy
3. Possession of and ability to use a smartphone
4. Female gender
5. Age ≥18 years
6. Written informed consent
7. Capacity of the patient to contract

Exclusion Criteria:

1. Pregnancy, Lactation
2. Expected non-compliance
